dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noStagesFound: No stages found for this tenant. Seed demo data to start testing the board.
dashboard.demoDataDescription: Complete demo setup created: cells, operators, jobs, parts, operations, resources, time entries, and quality records. You can delete this data anytime.
dashboard.noActiveWork: No active work at the moment
dashboard.stopClockingDescription: Review the active time entry and stop the clocking if needed.
dashboard.clockingStoppedDescription: Time tracking for {{operator}} on {{operation}} has been stopped.
dashboard.pastClosingTimeDescription: There are {{count}} active time entries after closing time ({{time}}). Consider stopping them.

organizationSettings.title: Organization Settings
organizationSettings.subtitle: Manage your organization profile and preferences
organizationSettings.timezoneDescription: Used for scheduling and due dates

factoryHours.title: Factory Hours
factoryHours.description: Configure your factory operating hours and automatic time tracking settings
factoryHours.autoStopDescription: Automatically stop all active time entries at factory closing time
factoryHours.autoStopWarning: Active time entries will be automatically stopped at {{time}} each day

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your application preferences and account settings

demoData.title: Demo Data
demoData.description: Create or clear demo data for testing and exploration
demoData.activeDescription: Demo data is currently active. Includes 6 operators, 4 jobs, 8 parts, and complete production workflows.
demoData.createDescription: Create realistic manufacturing demo data to explore all features. Includes Dutch companies, QRM workflows, and complete data relationships.
demoData.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete all demo data including:

gdpr.title: Data Deletion (GDPR)
gdpr.description: Permanently delete your account or entire organization data

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your user account and all associated personal data.
deleteAccount.warningMessage: This action cannot be undone. Your account, time entries, assignments, and issues will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data:
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: You will be immediately signed out and will not be able to recover your account.

deleteTenant.title: Delete Entire Organization
deleteTenant.description: Permanently delete your organization and ALL data for all users.
deleteTenant.warningMessage: This will delete ALL jobs, parts, operations, users, and data for your entire organization. This action affects ALL users in your organization and CANNOT be undone.
deleteTenant.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your organization and ALL data:
deleteTenant.confirmWarningMessage: This will delete data for ALL users in your organization. Everyone will lose access. This action is PERMANENT and CANNOT be undone.

gdpr.exportFirst: Before deleting, you can export your data using the
gdpr.seePolicy: For questions about data deletion, see our

users.title: User Management
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.advancedOptionsDescription: Create users with custom settings and email login.
users.createMachineDescription: Add a machine that reports progress via API (CNC, robots, etc).
users.createMachineSubtitle: Create a machine account that can report start/stop/progress via API.
users.machineApiKeyNote: An API key will be generated for this machine. Store it securely - it can only be shown once.
users.machineApiKeyWarning: Save this API key now - it will NOT be shown again!
users.shopFloorOperatorsDescription: PIN-based operators for shared shop floor terminals. These operators login with Employee ID + PIN.

activityMonitor.title: Activity Monitor
activityMonitor.description: Real-time platform activity feed with comprehensive audit trail
activityMonitor.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search query

exceptionInbox.title: Exception Inbox
exceptionInbox.description: Judgments derived from violated expectations - not alerts, but accountability
exceptionInbox.noExceptionsDescription: When expectations are violated, exceptions will appear here
exceptionInbox.rootCausePlaceholder: What caused this expectation to be violated?
exceptionInbox.correctiveActionPlaceholder: What was done to fix the immediate issue?
exceptionInbox.preventiveActionPlaceholder: What will prevent this from happening again?
exceptionInbox.dismissReasonPlaceholder: Why is this exception being dismissed?

expectations.title: Expectations
expectations.description: Explicit beliefs about what should happen. Each expectation is versioned and immutable.
expectations.supersededNote: This expectation was superseded by a newer version
expectations.violatedNote: This expectation was violated - see Exception Inbox
expectations.noExpectationsDescription: Expectations are created automatically when jobs get due dates or operations are scheduled.
expectations.whatIsDescription: An expectation is an explicit belief about what should happen in the future. Unlike alerts, expectations are created before reality unfolds. When reality diverges from expectation, an exception is raised.
expectations.onlyActiveEvaluated: Only Active expectations are evaluated against reality

myActivity.title: My Activity
myActivity.description: Your work history and time tracking
myActivity.noActivityDescription: You haven't worked on any operations yet
myActivity.notWorking: Not currently working on any operation

myIssues.title: My Issues
myIssues.noIssuesDescription: When you report issues, they will appear here

pricing.subtitle: Open source MES for metal fabrication. Self-host for full features.
pricing.needHelp: Need help with self-hosting or customization?

hostedDemo.note: For evaluation and educational purposes only

selfHosted.name: Self-Hosted

license.title: License (BSL 1.1)
license.tldr: Use it, modify it, self-host it. Just don't host it and charge others for access.

allowedItems.modify: Fork and modify for your needs

notAllowedItems.resell: Host it and sell access as a SaaS

myPlan.title: My Plan

myPlan.selfHostBenefits: Self-host Eryxon MES for unlimited usage and full control over your data.
myPlan.helpDescription: Sheet Metal Connect e.U. can help you set up and customize Eryxon MES for your operations.

featureFlags.title: Feature Flags
featureFlags.description: Enable or disable features for your organization
featureFlags.infoDescription: Disabled features will be hidden from the navigation menu. This helps simplify the interface by showing only the features you need.
featureFlags.footerNote: Changes take effect immediately. Disabled features can be re-enabled at any time.
